problem_text:
An element g of a finite group G is said to be vanishing if χ(g) = 0 for some irreducible complex character χ ∈ Irr(G). Must a finite group and a finite simple group be isomorphic if they have equal orders and the same set of orders of vanishing elements?
M. Foroudi Ghasemabadi, A. Iranmanesh,
